issue.message: Server URL '/' at index 0 in '../oak/apis/openapi/circl.lu/hashlookup/1.3/openapi.json' must be an absolute URL (e.g., start with http:// or https://).

repairs.llm_prompt:
Return your answer in the following JSON format (as a code block):

    "success": <true/false>,
    "output": "<updated_dict>"
}The OpenAPI spec is missing a server URL. Please provide only the URL, and only the URL, as a string.
